title: Art Exhibition - Rosie Lascelles
desc: Remains of the Day: new paintings by Rosie Lascelles November 6 ? November 10 Room artspace is pleased to present the paintings of Rosie Lascelles, a young emerging artist based in London. Her work evokes light fading on an imperial age, in pools of quirky ironies and strange harmonies, adrift in out of the way places on the edge of a receding era. Her impressions have been taken from extensive travel in South Asia and the Tibetan Plateau, and a recent residency in Nepal. For further information please contact virginia@roomartspacenyc.com roomartspacenyc.com Brooklyn, NY
